title: Class Time - Timetable
summary: The best timetable, which helps you locate yourself in the school spacetime
description: Discover the newest timetable, which always presents you with the current situation.On your phone and on your watch. A notification and widgets will give you all the information you need without opening the app.The Now tab informs you about:• the current class and time left to it's inevitable end,• the name of your next class, it's location, type and teacher• time left until your classes begin and breaks end.Automatically mute your phone during lessons and/or breaks!The Time Table tab shows the weekly schedule for each day with every detail on classes.The application allows you to edit, save and share your timetable with friends in an easy way.You can input more schedules and switch between them.You can also import your schedules from a calendar, like Google Calendar.
descriptionHTML:
Discover the newest timetable, which always presents you with the current situation.
On your phone and on your watch. A notification and widgets will give you all the information you need without opening the app.

The Now tab informs you about:
• the current class and time left to it's inevitable end,
• the name of your next class, it's location, type and teacher
• time left until your classes begin and breaks end.

Automatically mute your phone during lessons and/or breaks!

The Time Table tab shows the weekly schedule for each day with every detail on classes.

The application allows you to edit, save and share your timetable with friends in an easy way.
You can input more schedules and switch between them.

You can also import your schedules from a calendar, like Google Calendar.
comments: As a teacher this is invaluable. I always know exactly how long I have till class ends. It is perfect for making sure I get exit slips out in time and get cleanup taken care of. The developer responds quickly (Thank you) and I was able to find my notifications had been blocked on my watch somehow. If the watch could vibrate with the alerts like the phone at the time left that would be fantastic. Or if you could make a new schedule based off your old one easier for those odd days. Would make the app fantastic.  This app is a must have for Teachers, and I have recommended it to several already. Thanks again!
I wish it had a complication for wear 2.0 so i could always see how much time is left without needing a constant notification taking up my whole watch

Useless without some modifications.  It will not allow the naming of  schedules.  It will not allow more than 5 periods.  For my use as a teacher, and for the High School schedules where I work, it is useless, despite its many options.

Perfect app.. but problems with notification in miui... is that possible to add transparent backgroung for notification?? (i have bought notification color and widget) and can you add a widget color setting??
It is very useful in keeping an eye on my class schedule, with a good amount of detail. The app creators are also very helpful, responding almost immediately if any issues are encountered.
Thank you very much for solving my issues. I am therefore increasing the rating from 2 to 5. Good job developers
recentChanges: • Updated notification and widgets to not display the room info if it is not available
• Updated wear notification to display the first lesson before it starts
• Added option to use the lesson color as the notification color
